channel.title: Another 2 questions! I really need fast answerss!
channel.description:
If i attack someone, i hit 0, he hit 0, i hit 0, he hit0 etc. etc. What do i need to edit so someone does any damage? And where can i change animations?
BTW: It's a 317 server.

item.title: Another 2 questions! I really need fast answerss!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:4, topic:329084”]kewl story bro.

Add a new NPC attack system. Heres mine

		if (player != null) { //made by bill just read it -,-
		int defense = ((server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerLevel[1]/4) + (server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerBonus[6]/100));
if (misc.random(800) == 1){
hitDiff = 0;
}else{
hitDiff = (misc.random(npcs[NPCID].MaxHit) - misc.random(defense));
}
if (hitDiff < 0) {
		hitDiff = 0;
		}

}

NPChandeller.java btw[/quote]
Where do i need to enter the damage? BTW, i got another problem. I put in that the npc with id 2 needs to drop 1 mill gold, with 100% chance, but after i kill it, nothing happens?
My problem is that i want to do more damage. Thats my question. Or if it lays on the weapon, the weapon to do more damage.
Oh yeh, i think that was because i forgot to restart server lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Another 2 questions! I really need fast answerss!
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

kewl story bro.

Add a new NPC attack system. Heres mine

		if (player != null) { //made by bill just read it -,-
		int defense = ((server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerLevel[1]/4) + (server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerBonus[6]/100));
if (misc.random(800) == 1){
hitDiff = 0;
}else{
hitDiff = (misc.random(npcs[NPCID].MaxHit) - misc.random(defense));
}
if (hitDiff < 0) {
		hitDiff = 0;
		}

}

NPChandeller.java btw

item = 1363 Iron_battleaxe A_vicious_looking_axe. 146.212452810424 146.212452810424 165.399654557261 -2 8 5 0 0 0 0 0 0 -1 13 0 is what i see, where is the damage?

item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Go to Config>Item.cfg

Look for the item then change the damages…

If you tell me what items are they, i can give u a code for them…
